sentences.english: The pickled vegetable of bottled coriander heart is convenient and high quality.

sentences.english: Some investigators are extending the warning to the herb cilantro as well.

sentences.english: Those fearing scurvy might add some chopped parsley too.

definition: enoki mushroom (Flammulina velutipes, Japanese えのき茸 enokitake), used in cuisines of Japan, Korea and China, cultivated to be long, thin and white/abbr. to 金菇
